about_the_game:
Abyss Chaser is an action rogue-like dungeon crawler that combines melee and ranged combat with supernatural themes.

Embark on a path of vengeance as Abaddon - wrongfully disgraced rebel angel who travels the forsaken wasteland on his motorcycle hunting demons.

Grow in power during your Hunts, build your arsenal of weapons, gain support of otherworldly patrons and reclaim what's rightfully yours.

In Abyss Chaser you complete Hunts in procedurally generated levels searching for one of demons that corrupt this land.

For every run you can choose your equipment: Blade, Gun and a magical Amulet. You also get random spells and abilities from patrons that support you during the Hunt.

Each successful run grants you a permanent reward that you can use during your journey. Even failed runs leave you with some resources that you can use in your Road House to grow stronger.

Upgrade your weapons and your chopper. Inject Abyssal Ink to make tattoos of power. And don't forget to buy drinks for the road from the mysterious bartender.

The purpose of killing procedurally generated demon bosses of Forsaken Lands is to eventually gain keys that allow you to descend into the Depths of Hell.

Breaking subsequent seals of Hell introduces new enemies, encounters and events that you can find during your hunts.

Each domain of Hell features a unique demon lord that unlocks your further progress when slain.

Abyss Chaser is an action game with heavy gameplay focus but it also has a lore and narrative side.

You'll uncover the story of Abaddon getting betrayed and join him on a path to clear his name and get back what he lost.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Hunt demons as a biker rebel angel in this action-packed rogue-like dungeon crawler. Ride through Forsaken Lands and chase your enemies to the Depths of Hell using blades, guns, spells and support of otherworldly patrons.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
